trivia_items.text: His name means "knowledge" in ancient Greek, as in Gnosticism.
Gnosis has the trait of a black-necked crane (Grus nigricollis). The eponymous bird in white is present in his Elite 2 artwork.

Gnosis' attire in his Elite 2 artwork resembles that of the late Michael Jackson when performing the song Smooth Criminal. Additionally, his leitmotif is also named after one of Jackson's another famous song, Heal the World.
Gnosis was first teased back in the Karlan Trade trailer and wallpaper when Arknights was released alongside Degenbrecher and Monch. For more information, see Karlan Trade/Gallery.
Gnosis is the very first male Supporter, marking an end of the two-year period when Supporters are completely made up of female Operators.
Gnosis' Japanese voice actor, Hikaru Midorikawa, is an avid Arknights player and frequently posted about his gameplay and squad progress in his own blog.
